trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contentor de objetos de barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip é a classe base para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use ToolStrip and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: Utilize ToolStrip e respetivas classes associadas em novas aplicações do Windows Forms para criar barras de ferramentas que podem ter um Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, ou personalizado aspeto e comportamento, todos os com ou sem temas e com suportem para capacidade excedida e reordenação de item de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Controlos ToolStrip também lhe oferece uma experiência de tempo de criação avançada que inclui a ativação no local e editar, esquema personalizada e partilha de horizontal ou vertical espaço dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> especificado

trans-unit.source: The ToolStrip class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ToolStrip fornece muitos membros que gerem o desenho, rato e teclado de entrada e a funcionalidade de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all ToolStrip controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>classe Obtenha ainda mais controlo e customizability sobre o estilo de desenho e esquema de todos os controlos ToolStrip num formulário Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes itens são concebidos especificamente para trabalhar de forma totalmente integrada com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>em todos os orientations.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ToolStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> You can join ToolStrip controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge ToolStrip controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: Estão disponíveis por predefinição no momento da conceção para o controlo da ToolStrip:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>pode participar controlos ToolStrip dentro de uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>e intercalar controlos ToolStrip entre si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>vez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>para aplicações de várias documento Interface MDI ().</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a ToolStrip does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, uma ToolStrip não participa na ordem de tabulação, a menos que está posicionado absolutamente em vez de ser ancorado ou em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a ToolStrip.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>classe para alojar quaisquer outro controlo Windows Forms numa ToolStrip.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: By default, the ToolStrip is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> setting.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, a ToolStrip é dupla colocado na memória intermédia, tirando partido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>definição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora a ToolStrip substitui e adiciona funcionalidades para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controlo de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se optar por.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class with the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>s.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> classe com a matriz especificada de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>s.

trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a arrastar e largar e a reordenação de item são processadas através de eventos que implementar.

trans-unit.source: Set the AllowDrop property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AllowDrop como `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>propriedade `false` para responder ao comportamento de arrastar e largar que definiu no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set AllowDrop to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: Definir AllowDrop `false` e defina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` para fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>classe para processar o item de reordenação automaticamente e arrastar e largar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` para duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos para permitir o arrastamento de itens a partir de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para outro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar a predefinição arrastar e largar, deve ser premida a tecla ALT durante a operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: Setting both AllowDrop and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A definição de ambos os AllowDrop e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowMerge property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AllowMerge para ativar a elementos subordinados de vários documentos interface (MDI) combinar os respetivos menus correspondentes no principal MDI.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is bound and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os limites do contentor para o qual um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> está vinculado e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é redimensionado com o respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de âncora para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é automaticamente redimensionada como o seu controlo principal foi redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Anchoring um controlo para o seu controlo principal assegura que as extremidades ancoradas permanecerem na mesma posição relativa margens do controlo principal quando o controlo principal é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A âncora e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Só pode ser definido um momento e o conjunto de últimos tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoSize to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir AutoSize para `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>está incorporada um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>painel, os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não são convertidos quando mover <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para um painel diferente da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Traduzir os limites corretamente, sincronizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>evento, verifique o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>propriedade e redimensione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>propriedades dizem respeito a diferentes aspetos do processamento de imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar imagens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controlos ao definir estas propriedades diretamente ou através da definição de execução tempo – só <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's AutoSize setting.
trans-unit.target: Imagem de dimensionamento é determinado pela interação das propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte forma:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>e definição de AutoSize do contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se AutoSize `true` (predefinição) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem dimensionamento ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>tamanho é o facto do item de maior ou um tamanho mínimo prescrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se AutoSize `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>dimensionamento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo ajusta largura para caber estritamente o respetivo conteúdo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor não suporta cores transparentes, a menos que o `SupportsTransparentBackColor` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controlo que, se não estiver definida, são obtidos a partir do controlo principal.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terão o mesmo BackColor como o respetivo principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding context for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o contexto de enlace para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>De um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>devolve uma única <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>para todos os controlos vinculados a dados a contido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>mantém todos os controlos que estão vinculados a mesma origem de dados sincronizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>Especifica o item na lista subjacente que todos os controlos vinculados a dados, aponte para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>e atribuir-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be sent to an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> podem ser enviadas para um menu de sobrecarga.

trans-unit.source: Set the CanOverflow property to `true` to send a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item to an overflow menu when the item's content exceeds the width of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade CanOverflow como `true` para enviar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>item para um menu de sobrecarga quando o conteúdo do item excede a largura da barra de ferramentas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the ToolStrip Items Collection Editor to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se existirem mais de capacidade excedida de itens que podem ser apresentados no formulário, utilize o Editor de colecções de itens ToolStrip para gerir esta situação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to send <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> items to an overflow menu; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para enviar <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> itens a um menu de sobrecarga; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define qual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> limites são ancorado ao seu controlo principal e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é redimensionado com o respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade Dock para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é automaticamente redimensionada como o seu controlo principal foi redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definir ancoragem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para alinhar a próprio com as margens esquerdas do seu controlo principal e redimensionar porque o controlo principal é redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controlos estiverem ancorados na respetiva ordem z, que é o visual dispor de controlos num formulário ao longo de centróide do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo pode ser ancorado a um limite do respectivo contentor principal ou pode ser ancorado para todas as extremidades e preencher o contentor de elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> can be repositioned within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and across <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controlo está num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>pode ser reposicionadas dentro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>e entre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The Dock property is ignored, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property is `false`, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> grows as items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Dock é ignorada e se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>propriedade é `false`, o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>crescimentos itens são adicionadas para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não participa na ordem de tabulação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and Dock properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>e propriedades de ancoragem são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only ImageList property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar imagens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controlos ao definir estas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a propriedade de ImageList executar tempo – só.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Imagem de dimensionamento é determinado pela interação das propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte forma:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>definição e o contentor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>definição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `true` (predefinição) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem dimensionamento ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>tamanho é o facto do item de maior ou um tamanho mínimo prescrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>dimensionamento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um caráter um carácter de entrada que reconhece o item.

trans-unit.source: The IsInputChar method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O método de IsInputChar é chamado durante a mensagem de janela Pré-processamentos para determinar se o carácter de entrada fornecido deve ser pré-processado ou enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: If the IsInputChar method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Se o método IsInputChar devolve `true`, caráter especificado é enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o método devolve `false`, o caráter de pré-processado e apenas enviado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>se não é consumido pela fase de preprocessing.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processamentos de um caráter incluem a verificar se o caráter uma mnemónica ser exigido de outro controlo.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: O caráter para testar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter deve ser enviado diretamente para o item e não pré-processado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to retrieve all the items that have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, not just the items that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a coleção de itens para obter todos os itens que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, não apenas os itens que são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: An item remains in the Items collection even if it is an overflow item and is therefore not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Um item permanece na coleção de itens, mesmo se é um item de capacidade excedida e não é atualmente visível.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to retrieve only the items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>propriedade obter apenas os itens que estão atualmente apresentados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref>, que representa todos os elementos contidos por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o esquema do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> está concluída.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens se ajustar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, aparece automaticamente um botão de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>definição de propriedade determina se um item é apresentado na área de capacidade excedida sempre, conforme necessário ou nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the LayoutCompleted event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Inspecione o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade no evento para determinar se um item foi colocado no principal LayoutCompleted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, a capacidade excedida <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se está não atualmente visível em todos os.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Os motivos pelos quais típicos por que razão não for apresentado um item estão de que o item não se ajustará o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.target: O controlo de tamanho não será apresentado, exceto se também definir a propriedade LayoutStyle para um dos valores de capacidade excedida.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessDialogKey denomina-se durante a mensagem pré-processamentos para lidar com carateres de caixa de diálogo como SEPARADOR, devolver, ESCAPE e teclas de seta.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>método indica que o controlo não está a processar a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent control's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O ProcessDialogKey simplesmente envia o caráter para o método de ProcessDialogKey do controlo principal ou devolve `false` se o controlo não tem um principal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>classe substitui este método para efetuar o processamento real das chaves de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método só é chamado quando o controlo está alojado numa aplicação do Windows Forms ou um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caráter mnemónica.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessMnemonic method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessMnemonic denomina-se para dar a oportunidade de processar um caráter mnemónica de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve determinar se o controlo está em estado de processo mnemonics e se o caráter especificado representa uma mnemónica ser exigido.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se Sim, o método deve executar a ação associada mnemónica ser exigido e devolver `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: As implementações deste método, muitas vezes, utilizam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para determinar se o caráter especificado corresponde a uma mnemónica ser exigido no texto do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação predefinida do método ProcessMnemonic simplesmente devolve `false`, para indicar que o controlo não tem nenhum mnemónica ser exigido.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado como uma mnemónica ser exigido pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa um controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, especifica a direção na ordem de tabulação para selecionar o controlo de.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: O `directed` e `forward` parâmetros são utilizados pelos controlos de estilo de contentor.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `directed` parâmetro está definido como `true`, a `forward` parâmetro é avaliado para determinar que controlam a selecionar.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando `forward` está definido como `true`, é selecionado o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação; quando `false`, o controlo anterior na ordem de separadores é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método Select ativa o controlo se o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>bit de estilo está definido como `true`, está contido no outro controlo e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão visíveis e ativados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar a direção do controlo para selecionar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para mover reencaminhar na ordem de tabulação; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para trás mover na ordem de tabulação.
